description.value:
An orange prism aeon stone must be activated to provide a benefit. The resonant power grants you a +2 item bonus to Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion checks-whichever corresponds to the tradition of the last spell you enhanced with this aeon stone.

Activate A envision

Effect If your next action is to Cast a Spell, that spell's level is 1 higher (maximum 10th level) for the purposes of counteracting and being counteracted.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Arcana)]{Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Arcana)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Nature)]{Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Nature)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Occultism)]{Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Occultism)}

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Religion)]{Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Religion)}
